channel.title: Item spawn help!
channel.description:
what do you type before putting the item ID code
and do you type it in the black box or the speach box?[br][size=1]Posted at: July 19, 2006, 08:52:19 AM[/size][hr]somebody help me please!
whats the code for spawning items!

item.title: Item spawn help!
item.dc:creator: @Texasmd91 Texasmd91
item.description:
@Texasmd91 wrote:

::pickup #### #

####=item id
#number you want to spawn (1 unless you have the code for noted)

btw the server either has to be a spawning server, or you have to be admin of it, if its on a new server you created go into client.java and press ctrl+F, and find “//start of moderator”
after that you will see a few of these[code]

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“USERNAME”))
{
playerRights = #;
}[/code]
for username puyt in your name, for # put in 3 (3 for admin, 2 for staff, 1 for mod)

EDIT: and you type it in the game, not the console.

Read full topic
